title: To the Point: Concise Couples Counseling for Pastors
description: One thing pastors find in short supply is time. Second to that is training to keep up with the complexities of the changing needs within a congregation. Helping those who come to the pastor get to the point quickly and compassionately increases the pastorâ€™s effectiveness. It buys back time. It builds trust with those who need to trust their spiritual leader. To the Point will give you the time and extra skill you need to focus on what is most important: your people.This was written to help pastors, but couples can download and use this in a self-help format and deeply enrich their relationship by quickly getting To the Point of their "rough spots."
author: Mark    Mills
